parameter.name: X_ADB_IPVersionRestricted
parameter.description: When {{true}}, the CPE forwards A-type queries to ipv4 dns servers only and the AAAA-type queries to ipv6 dns servers only.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ReqIPVersionOnRedirect
parameter.description: When {{true}}, in case of the CPE receives an A-type query from an IPv6 client or an AAAA-type query from an IPv4 client, the reply value is related to the requested IP version (instead of the IP version used to generate the query by the client)

parameter.name: X_ADB_TCPRestricted
parameter.description: When {{true}}, dns server will be listening for TCP queries on interfaces listed in {{param|X_ADB_TCPAllowedIfaces}} only. Otherwise dns server will listen on all available interfaces.

parameter.name: X_ADB_TCPAllowedIfaces
parameter.description: Comma separated list of interface objects. If {{param|X_ADB_TCPRestricted}} is {{true}}, dns server will listen for TCP queries on these interfaces only.

parameter.name: X_ADB_NoFallbackRCODEs
parameter.description: Comma separated list of Response Code (RCODE) values as specified in RFC1035 for which fallback will be disabled.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DynamicServerRuleNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: X_ADB_CacheEnable
parameter.description: Enable DNS cache Management

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFiltering
parameter.description: Hostnames belonging to this domain are resolved by this DNS server. Hostnames which don't match will be handled by different {{object}} objects. If {{empty}}, resolution is allowed for any domain.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFilteringRestricted
parameter.description: If {{true}}, fallback on failure for queries matching this entry will be performed only if the domain filter of the next chosen entry is the same as the original matching filter.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainInterface
parameter.description: This interface is used for outbound queries only for {{param|#.Server.{i}.X_ADB_DomainFiltering}} domains.

parameter.name: X_ADB_Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in {{units}} to wait for a server response.

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioBase
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDomain
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a specific Domain (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_Permissions
parameter.description: User access permissions to this {{object}}.

object.name: DNS.Client.X_ADB_DynamicServerRule.{i}.
object.description: Rules for dynamically-acquired DNS serving entries. These define a template for {{object|.DNS.Client.Server}} objects which are dynamically created.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: A non-volatile handle used to reference this instance. {{param}} provides a mechanism for an ACS to label this instance for future reference.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables this entry.

parameter.name: Interface
parameter.description: Specifies the IP interface over which the DNS query is sent. If an empty string is specified, the CPE MUST use its routing policy (IP Forwarding table entries), if necessary, to determine the appropriate interface.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: The status of this entry.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.description: Method used to assign the {{param|#.Server.{i}.DNSServer}} address.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFiltering
parameter.description: Hostnames belonging to this domain are resolved by this DNS server. Hostnames which don't match will be handled by different {{object}} objects. If {{empty}}, resolution is allowed for any domain.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFilteringRestricted
parameter.description: If {{true}}, fallback on failure for queries matching this entry will be performed only if the domain filter of the next chosen entry is the same as the original matching filter.

parameter.name: X_ADB_Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in {{units}} to wait for a server response.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ForceDrop
parameter.description: It forces the creation of rules to drop matching DNS queries. This behavior is useful to drop DNS queries preventing that these queries are routed on the wrong interface during transitorial phases.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DontCreate
parameter.description: On dynamic DNS rules learning (e.g. via DHCP), the client rule will be not created. This behavior is useful when the configuration requires to deny locally generated DNS traffic to a specific interface.

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioBase
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDomain
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a specific Domain (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDrop
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a Drop Rule (useful only when X_ADB_ForceDrop is enabled).

parameter.name: X_ADB_Permissions
parameter.description: User access permissions to this {{object}}.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DynamicForwardingRuleNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: X_ADB_InboundInterface
parameter.description: If not empty, specifies a IP interface this DNS relay is bound to for incoming requests.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFiltering
parameter.description: Hostnames belonging to this domain are resolved by this DNS relay. Hostnames which don't match will be handled by different {{object}} objects. If empty, resolution is allowed for any domain.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFilteringRestricted
parameter.description: If {{true}}, fallback on failure for queries matching this entry will be performed only if the domain filter of the next chosen entry is the same as the original matching filter.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainInterface
parameter.description: This interface is used for outbound queries only for {{param|#.Forwarding.{i}.X_ADB_DomainFiltering}} domains.

parameter.name: X_ADB_Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in {{units}} to wait for a server response.

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioBase
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDomain
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a specific Domain (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_Permissions
parameter.description: User access permissions to this {{object}}.

object.name: DNS.Relay.X_ADB_DynamicForwardingRule.{i}.
object.description: Rules for dynamically-acquired DNS Relay forwarding entries. These define a template for {{object|.DNS.Relay.Forwarding}} objects which are dynamically created.

parameter.name: Alias
parameter.description: A non-volatile handle used to reference this instance. {{param}} provides a mechanism for an ACS to label this instance for future reference.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables this entry.

parameter.name: Interface
parameter.description: Specifies the IP interface over which the DNS query is sent. If an empty string is specified, the CPE MUST use its routing policy (IP Forwarding table entries), if necessary, to determine the appropriate interface.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: The status of this entry.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.description: Method used to assign the {{param|#.Forwarding.{i}.DNSServer}} address.

parameter.name: X_ADB_InboundInterface
parameter.description: If not empty, specifies a IP interface this DNS relay is bound to for incoming requests.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFiltering
parameter.description: Hostnames belonging to this domain are resolved by this DNS relay. Hostnames which don't match will be handled by different {{object}} objects. If empty, resolution is allowed for any domain.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DomainFilteringRestricted
parameter.description: If {{true}}, fallback on failure for queries matching this entry will be performed only if the domain filter of the next chosen entry is the same as the original matching filter.

parameter.name: X_ADB_Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in {{units}} to wait for a server response.

parameter.name: X_ADB_DontCreate
parameter.description: On dynamic DNS rules learning (e.g. via DHCP), the forwarding relay rule will be not created. This behavior is useful when the configuration requires to deny locally generated DNS traffic to a specific interface.

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioBase
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDomain
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a specific Domain (useful only for the fallback functionality).

parameter.name: X_ADB_PrioDrop
parameter.description: Allows to set a specific priority to the DNS server for a Drop Rule (useful only when X_ADB_ForceDrop is enabled).

parameter.name: X_ADB_Permissions
parameter.description: User access permissions to this {{object}}.
